ygData.subject: Re: The worth of a Wizard (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think it sounds pretty cool - a portable mana battery. How about some other possible other effects ... At the very high levels it could regenerate mana
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:46 PM 05/27/1999 -0500, you wrote:
>From: James Dwyer <jdwar@...>
>
>I have an idea. All the other spellcasting classes have pets (including
>hybrids with their charms). Instead of getting a pet, since we are so
>mana dependent ( and the other classes have pets which do WAY more for
>the mana then we can do with DD over time) we get a familiar.

I think it sounds pretty cool - a portable mana battery.

How about some other possible other effects ...

At the very high levels it could regenerate mana (the mana we have stored
in it, not the mana stored in us).

If it's large enough, we could use it for a pack animal. We're (generally)
not that strong and hey, it's not fighting - throw some saddlebags on it. =)



-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
